name: Resolution Test
description: An extension for developers to test web pages in different screen resolutions, with an option to define your own resolutions
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://www.benbeckford.com; child-src 'self' https://www.benbeckford.com; frame-ancestors 'self' https://www.benbeckford.com; object-src 'self'
